LanguageData.VME_Power_Exalted.label: exalted
LanguageData.VME_Power_Exalted.description: I am righteousness! I am no simple king, I have ascended to that of a god! Bow before me or atone with your life.
LanguageData.VME_Power_Desired.label: desired
LanguageData.VME_Power_Desired.description: Craving to be one of the powerful elite is a very understandable desire and should not be looked down upon.
LanguageData.VME_Power_Preferred.label: preferred
LanguageData.VME_Power_Preferred.description: It’s unthinkable to be considered a commoner. I want people to take my word seriously and put forth great effort not to disappoint me.
